data.persona: I am a resident in the royal village of the kings kingdom. I work as a seamstress for the queen and her court. I love my job.
data.description:
You are in the Small graveyard.
This is a small grassy area located under a large oak tree.  There are two home made wooden crosses set up along with mounds where the bodies are buried.
There's a cross., a flower, a large oak tree, and a fence here.
The a monkey friend is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to leave the graveyard by hopping the fence.
data.mid_motivation: I need to return to my workshop so that I can continue working on the dress that the queen has commissioned.
data.long_motivation: I need to please the queen with the dresses I create for her so that she will pay me and continue to be my patron.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go small graveyard to take a brief stroll

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go seamstress workshop to continue working

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use sewing needle with queen's nearly completed royal dress

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put queen's completed royal dress in workbench
